program.name: National School Lunch Program
program.description_short: Free or low-cost healthy school meals for children.
program.description:
Free or low-cost healthy school meals for children. When you enroll in the school meal program, your child may get free breakfast and/or lunch at school. You can apply at your child's school. It may take up to 10 days to get this benefit.

If your school is a Community Eligibility Provision (CEP) school, your child may already qualify for free meals.
program.website_description: Free or low-cost meals for students and other reduced program fees
